titles.title: An introduction to modern web application development with Javascript

This covered testing, configuration and environment management, and the use of MongoDB for storing the applicationâ€™s data. The course content is the same as in the Full stack course held at the Department of Computer Science at the University of Helsinki in Spring 2020.
